lines.text: We ask ourselves, is she black? Is she white? We don't care. She's exotic. I want to see more of her breasts.
You know, I don't usually do this.

[looking at her plate of escargot in a fancy restaurant]
So somebody went all the way to France for this?
[after seeing Sylk's lip synched performance which featured Billie's voice]
I had no idea you could blow like that.

[suggestively]
I didn't know you were so interested in how good I could blow.
"Woe is me?" What the hell is that?

[to Billie]
Do you really think inside your mind that because you swing your ass around on stage and you hit a couple of high notes here and there, that you are some colossal success?
I like hanging out wit you, Billie.
